game.name: Titanfall® 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV
game.shortDescription: 디지털 디럭스 콘텐츠 및 점프 스타트 팩, 언더그라운드 R-201 Carbine 커스텀 무기 스킨이 포함되어 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Respawn Entertainment gives you the most advanced titan technology in its new, single player campaign & multiplayer experience. Combine & conquer with new titans & pilots, deadlier weapons, & customization and progression systems that help you and your titan flow as one unstoppable killing force.

reviewHighlights.text: Vince Zampella will be remembered as one of the great innovators within interactive media. Medal of Honor, Call of Duty, Titanfall, and Battlefield 6....
Oh my god! This is probably the best FPS game that I've ever played till now! EA, now please give us Titanfall 3!!! You can do it, make it a great sin...
